A

addAsyncHandler(CreationHandler) - Method in class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedExceptionConfiguration
Adds a CreationHandler object which is executed asynchronously just after a ReasonedException is created.
addSyncHandler(CreationHandler) - Method in class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedExceptionConfiguration
Adds a CreationHandler object which is executed synchronously just after a ReasonedException is created.

B

Builder() - Constructor for class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException.Builder
Creates a new instance of this class with no arguments.
by(Enum<?>) - Method in class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException.Builder
Builds a ReasonedException instance.
by(Enum<?>) - Static method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Creates an instance of this class with the specified reason.
by(Enum<?>, Throwable) - Method in class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException.Builder
Builds a ReasonedException instance with a cause exception.
by(Enum<?>, Throwable) - Static method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Creates an instance of this class with the specified reason and cause.

C

CreationHandler - Interface in sttk.reasonederror
This class is an ReasonedException creation handler.

F

fix() - Method in class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedExceptionConfiguration

G

getClassName() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Returns the fully qualified name of the class of this error occurrence.
getFileName() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Returns the name of the source file of this error occurrence.
getLineNumber() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Returns the line number of the source file of this error occurrence.
getMessage() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Gets a message represents this exception.
getMethodName() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Returns the name of the method of this error occurrence.
getReason() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Gets the reason of this exception.
getSituation() - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Gets an unmodifiable map which contains error situation parameters.
getSituationValue(Enum<?>) - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Gets an error situation parameter value by the name of the specified enum value.
getSituationValue(String) - Method in exception sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedException
Gets a error situation parameter value by the specified name.

H

handle(ReasonedException, OffsetDateTime) - Method in interface sttk.reasonederror.CreationHandler
Handles an ReasonedException object which will be created right after.

N

notifier - Static variable in class sttk.reasonederror.ReasonedExceptionConfiguration
The CreationNotifier object which manages CreationHandlers.

R

The builder class of ReasonedException.

This is a cofiguration class which configures behaviors of ReasonedException.
